data.title: Non Stop Kids Entertainment Reviews
data.meta_description: Non Stop Kids Entertainment has 5 stars! Check out what 721 people have written so far, and share your own experience.
data.text:
A successful work event

Our entertainer Sean was absolutely brilliant. He kept the kids engaged and having fun throughout, even the adults enjoyed watching from the side. Our first Bring Your Kids to work Day at Zscaler UK (London office) was a huge success. The whole process from enquiry, to booking, to execution was very easy and I will definitely recommend your services. Thank you

Date of experience : 09 August 2024

5th birthday party

Lee was amazing from the moment he arrived and met my daughter who's 5th birthday it was. There was 30 children at the party and I have never seen so many children so engaged with someone. They absolutely loved every minute of it all. He was amazing and even the adults laughed until there bellys hurt. Would definitely recommend him and he is for sure a massive asset to your company.

Date of experience : 10 August 2024

Wonderful party

Steve leave been wonderful since the very first moment, professional in organising the 2 hours, funny with both kids and adults.

We used the company 2 years ago and we were happy to use you again but Steve has made a even bigger impression

Date of experience : 10 August 2024

Amazing

Toby was wonderful. He came on time and was super professional and friendly. All children enjoyed the show so much that parents were all commenting how brilliant idea was to have this entertainment. I will definitely be recommending your services and booking again for next events.

Date of experience : 27 July 2024

Professional and fun!

Amie was professional from start to finish. The children had so much fun! Even the parents commented on how great the entertainment was.

Will absolutely be recommending! Thank you so much our daughter said it was the BEST party ever!

Date of experience : 04 August 2024

Nemed made our sons 5th birthday party…

Nemed made our sons 5th birthday party one to remember. From meeting him in the car park, to the part where everyone arrived. He just made the atmosphere one worth while for the kids. There was a lot of mind blown little minds from the magic show and sweaty faces from the dancing. I would 100% recommend Nemed in the future and will definitely have you guys again. All the parents have mentioned how much fun their kiddies had. From start to finish the communication was impeccable.

Thank you for a smooth party process from a mum and thank you for making a little boys day the 'best he ever had'

Date of experience : 07 July 2024

Birthday party - Mark

Mark done an excellent job today at my daughter’s party. All the children absolutely loved him and they had an amazing afternoon. He was brilliant at keeping the kids engaged and went above and beyond. The range of activities was brilliant and even the adults had a great time.

Would definitely recommend to anyone.

Date of experience : 27 July 2024

Reply from Non Stop Kids Entertainment

Thank you for leaving a review for Chi-Chi and your face painters. We love hearing about people's events and how our performers were so well received. If you'd like to book agin, please let us know.

Amie was brilliant with the kids

Amie was brilliant with the kids and parents, she was lots of fun, friendly and professional, all the parents where impressed with Amie and her ability to engage and entertain the children,all the chidren left the party happy with big smile on their faces..thank you Amie for making Ariana's 5th birthday so memorable!!

Date of experience : 27 July 2024

Kieran started interacting with the…

Kieran started interacting with the kids as soon as he could, as they were all a bit delayed due to local road closures, so he improvised brilliantly. He kept them all entertained the entire time and helped with singing happy birthday also. Worth every single penny!

Date of experience : 21 July 2024

Mark was wonderful and the children…

Mark was wonderful and the children absolutely loved him. The Magic Show was a first for Ryhall Village Fete and a huge success given the amount of positive feedback I have received about it and Mark. He had them all squealing with laughter and excitement in all the right places. He was also flexible and accommodated the rather open setting in the grounds of Ryhall Hall. Thank you so much Mark. Highly recommended!

Date of experience : 13 July 2024

Amazing Experience

Teddy was absolutely fantastic, had quite a few parents praising the entertainment to me and have already recommended to people that may be looking to book with yourselves in the future. Thank you again!

Date of experience : 27 July 2024

Reply from Non Stop Kids Entertainment

Thank you for your review Emily. It's great to hear that you are already recommending us! You know where we are if you'd like to rebook in the future too :)

Absolutely amazing all the children…

Absolutely amazing all the children loved it even the adults I had every parent say how amazing he was at the end they have also asked where I found him and have asked for the details so so good he made the modest of people laugh and my child gets bored easily but she did not even move she loved it thankyou so much will be booking again in future

Date of experience : 09 August 2024

Honestly the best!

Tyler did such an amazing job at my daughter’s 5th birthday party! The children all had a wonderful time and enjoyed all the party games and music. I would honestly recommend Tyler, and Non-Stop Kids to anyone looking for a kid’s entertainer!

Thanks so much to the friendly team for all their help in ensuring we had a a great party!

Date of experience : 14 July 2024

Izabella was amazing

Izabella was amazing, the kids have enjoyed all activities. The Disco was the best package ever, I will definitely recommend their service. Thank you so much for making such a memorable and enjoyable day for my little girl and her friends.

Date of experience : 13 July 2024

Reply from Non Stop Kids Entertainment

Hi Stephanie,

We couldn't agree more - our Fun Filled Disco package really is awesome! We think that the way it is crammed full of high energy party games and action dances means the little ones get to have lots of fun and also burn off plenty energy at the same time :) An all round win for all.

We are really pleased that Djihon and friends had a fantastic time and we hope to be able to supply entertainment for many more of your parties going forwards.

Thanks

Katie

Excellent day and a party to remember

Excellent day and a party to remember. Everyone loved it and Tanya dealt with the boisterous kids extremely well at the start. She was thoroughly entertaining and the 5-8 year olds were amazed and excited throughout. We had a power cut affecting the whole area with 10 mins to go but Tanya dealt with it well and continued professionally.

Date of experience : 06 July 2024

Reply from Non Stop Kids Entertainment

Hi Kylie, thank you for your 5 star review. We're glad that the power cut didn't affect the party too much. We think Tanya is amazing too! Please let us know if you'd like us to host another party for you.

1st birthday party mix kids ages

The children felt the entertainer was approachable and really didnt hesitate to take part in all party games, magic show , disco music to kids taste. However the baby was missed out with her one to one puppet show. The entertainer was polite well mannered and happy to go with the flow of the party .

Date of experience : 06 July 2024
